title: Davos 2026: 'You don't use AI to do the same thing you do today,' PwC chairman Kande sees tech reimagining biz
description: Artificial intelligence is transforming professional services. PwC's Mohamed Kande states AI is not just augmenting jobs but redefining them. Companies cannot afford to wait and see.

title: How playing Pokémon became the ultimate test of AI’s intelligence
description: Nintendo’s original Pokémon games are becoming a popular and strangely effective way to test and benchmark new artificial-intelligence models. “We’re all a whole bunch of nerds,” said the man behind the trend.
